title: LoL App won't launch. I've done practically everything and it still does not work.
body: The problem began this morning when I launched the game and signed in normally. I closed it after a while and when i tried to open it it wouldn't open. I re-installed it and still nothing. The league og legend's logo would stuck on the screen without responding, once I clicked it it would always say"PVP.NET Kernel not responding " (something among those lines). I proceeded to re-install it again and run it as an administrator a few times until it finally, took me to the home page where it said launch. I hit launch but the percentage was at 0 and the homepage was black (no thumbnails, etc.) After a while of deactivating my antivirus, giving permission to the firewall, deactivating the firewall, deleting every file,and reinstalling the game It finally worked, but my home page was still a black screen. I played a couple of games, (couldn't access the shop either, was a black screen too) theN quit, when I went to launch the game again it was back to square one. Same problem and still can't fix it. SOMEBODY HELP.

replies.body:
This sounds an awful like a poor connection to the servers is preventing your client from loading assets from the servers and preventing you from accessing specific services within the client. These issues are often caused by an unstable connection to our servers, so I'd recommend working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to address the most common solutions.

Let me know if those steps caused any change.
